parts.text: {"word":"darse","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(古語)与える (darの古形)","english_definition":"(Archaic) to give (archaic form of 'dar')","examples":[{"sentence":"Dios te darse gracia.","translation":"神の恵みがあらんことを。(古語の祈りの言葉)","type":"archaic","notes":"This is an example of the archaic usage in religious contexts."}],"collocations":[],"synonyms":["dar"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"古スペイン語に由来し、ラテン語の'dare'（与える）から派生した。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"notes":"発音は現代スペイン語の'dar'と同じです。"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["doy (yo)","das (tú)","da (él/ella/usted)","damos (nosotros)","dais (vosotros)","dan (ellos/ellas/ustedes)"],"past_simple":["di (yo)","diste (tú)","dio (él/ella/usted)","dimos (nosotros)","disteis (vosotros)","dieron (ellos/ellas/ustedes)"],"future_simple":["daré (yo)","darás (tú)","dará (él/ella/usted)","daremos (nosotros)","daréis (vosotros)","darán (ellos/ellas/ustedes)"],"conditional_simple":["daría (yo)","darías (tú)","daría (él/ella/usted)","daríamos (nosotros)","daríais (vosotros)","darían (ellos/ellas/ustedes)"],"present_subjunctive":["dé (yo)","des (tú)","dé (él/ella/usted)","demos (nosotros)","deis (vosotros)","den (ellos/ellas/ustedes)"],"imperfect_subjunctive":["diera/diese (yo)","dieras/dieses (tú)","diera/diese (él/ella/usted)","diéramos/diésemos (nosotros)","dierais/dieseis (vosotros)","dieran/diesen (ellos/ellas/ustedes)"],"imperative":["da (tú)","dé (usted)","demos (nosotros)","dad (vosotros)","den (ustedes)"]],"notes":"'darse'は再帰動詞としても使われますが、このエントリーは基本的な'dar'の古形についてです。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'darse'は現代スペイン語ではほとんど使われず、'dar'が一般的な形です。文学作品や歴史的な文書、宗教的な文脈で見られることがあります。現代のスペイン語学習者は'dar'を学ぶべきです。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Darse un libro.","correct":"Dar un libro.","note":"現代スペイン語では'dar'を使用します。"}],"priority":"★★★"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["dado (与えられた)","dador (与える人)","dádiva (贈り物)"],"modern_forms":["dar (与える)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"notes":"非常にまれ。現代スペイン語の学習には重要ではありません。"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C2","text":"'Darse'は古語であり、現代スペイン語ではほとんど使用されません。そのため、上級レベルの読解において、歴史的なテキストや文学作品に触れる場合に理解しておくべき単語です。現代スペイン語では'dar'を使用します。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"(古語) El rey darse cuenta de la situación.","translation":"(古語) 王はその状況に気づいた。","type":"archaic","meaning_category":"与える (気づきを与える、の意)"}]}
